data.title: Adobe - M&A Summary and Business Overview
data.meta_description:
Adobe has acquired 61 companies, including 6 in the last 5 years. A total of 15 acquisitions came from private equity firms.
                Adobe’s largest acquisition to date was in 2018, when it acquired Marketo for $4.8B. Adobe has acquired in 9 different US states, and 8 countries. The Company’s most targeted sectors include software (60%) and  internet software and services (35%).
data.text:
Adobe M&A Summary

Adobe has acquired 61 companies, including 6 in the last 5 years. A total of 15 acquisitions came from private equity firms.

Adobe’s largest acquisition to date was in 2018, when it acquired Marketo for $4.8B. Adobe has acquired in 9 different US states, and 8 countries. The Company’s most targeted sectors include software (60%) and internet software and services (35%).

Adobe Business Overview
